refnamediv.refpurpose: Saxon character representation used in generated HTML pages

refsection.para: This parameter has effect only when Saxon 6 is used (version 6.4.2 or later). It sets the character representation in files generated by the chunking stylesheets. If you want to suppress entity references for characters with direct representations in chunker.output.encoding, set the parameter value to native.
For more information, see Saxon output character representation.

note.para: This parameter is documented here, but the declaration is actually in the chunker.xsl stylesheet module.
